thread.title: BRIEF-JinkoSolar Says It Priced Follow-On Offering Of 3.6 Mln American Depositary Shares At $18.15 Per ADS

title: BRIEF-JinkoSolar Says It Priced Follow-On Offering Of 3.6 Mln American Depositary Shares At $18.15 Per ADS
text:
10 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-JinkoSolar Says It Priced Follow-On Offering Of 3.6 Mln American Depositary Shares At $18.15 Per ADS Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Jinkosolar Holding Co Ltd: 
* JINKOSOLAR ANNOUNCES PRICING OF FOLLOW-ON OFFERING OF 3,600,000 AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES AND US$35 MILLION CONCURRENT PRIVATE PLACEMENT 
* JINKOSOLAR HOLDING CO LTD SAYS IT PRICED THE FOLLOW-ON OFFERING OF 3.6 MILLION AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES AT US$18.15 PER ADS Source text for Eikon:
